title: Kannan Varum Velai Lyrics Deepavali
stanzas:
kanna varum velai
andhi maalai
naan kathirundhen

chinna chinna thayakkam
chella mayakkam adhai
yaerka nindren

kattu kadangaa
enna alaigal
rekkai virikkum
rendu vizhigal

kanna varum velai
andhi maalai
naan kathirundhen

chinna chinna thayakkam
sila mayakkam adhai
yaerka nindren

maan koli kollumaasai
yaadi thoppathu
kaimaasam kollumaasai
kodi paarpathu
thaerkaalgal kollumaasai
veedhi servathu
or eesal kollumaasai
theeyil vazhvadhu

kooravaa ingu enathu aasaiyai
thozhalane vandhu mulary meedhaiyai
kodi kodi aasai theerum maalai..

poovasam thendralodu servenume
aanvaasam thottidaatha
dhegam ooname.
thaaipaasam paththu maadham
baaram thaangume
vazhnaalil michcha baaram
kadhal yendhume.

neendanaal kanda
kanavu theerave
venduven unnai
ilamai oorave

kanna varum velai
andhi maalai
naan kathirundhen

chinna chinna thayakkam
chella mayakkam adhai
yaerka nindren

kattu kadangaa
enna alaigal
rekkai virikkum
rendu vizhigal

seo.title: Kannan Varum Velai Lyrics Deepavali
seo.description: Get the complete Kannan Varum Velai Lyrics Deepavali from Deepavali. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by Yuvan and sung by Anuradha Sriram. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Deepavali, Yuvan, Anuradha Sriram, Madhusree, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
